name: FASHOS
overview:
FASHOS: Your very own Shoe Shopper

With the launch of an interactive fashion footwear shopping portal, FASHOS has upped the online shopping experience by a remarkable level. More than a modest start â€“ over 50 brands and 1000 plus footwear styles â€“ all accessible at the click of a button! A 360-degree view of each product and a bunch of stylists at the back-end to design your range of footwear specially suited to your style, can we be complaining??

FASHOS.com is a fresh approach to suggestive buying online. It very carefully caters to the needs of the traditional shopper as well as the social online shopper. “The model is recommendation based, and creates a personalized showcase for customers according to their unique style requirements” says Navin Joshua, Founder â€“ FASHOS. Internationally more than half the retailers profiled in the 2011 Internet Retailer Top 500 survey, employ personalization on their e-commerce sites, as the consumers both want and expect the same for the convenience and the ease the model offers. â€œIn India however, an exciting challenge lies in getting the customer addicted to a personalized way of shopping, as once they get a hang of it, they are bound to come back than opt for the standard display of products” says Sumit Agarwal, co-founder - FASHOS.

An impressive portfolio ranging from a wide collection of sportswear to fashion brands like Vanilla moon, Carlton London, Hush Puppies and FASHOS’s very own line of shoes crafted specially by a team of Italian designers, FASHOS.com has a lot in store for each one of us looking for that special shoe.

The team has a strong background of living up to the customer promise and exceeding guest expectations (as they call it). With a ‘no questions askedâ€™ return policy and a well-equipped multi channel Guest Relations help desk, FASHOS promises to pamper its customers and make it a destination of choice for footwear lovers.

Website: www.FASHOS.com Contact: 91-11-49133000, guestrelations@fashos.com Facebook: www.facebook.com/fashosonline Twitter: www.twitter.com/fashosonline
